data.taskTitle: Migrate TaskDetailDrawer.svelte to DaisyUI classes (135 colors)
Migrate TaskDetailDrawer.svelte to DaisyUI classes (135 colors)
data.approach: Systematically replace oklch colors with DaisyUI semantic classes. Group by color purpose: backgrounds (bg-base-*), borders (border-base-*), text (text-base-content/*, text-success, text-error), state colors (success, warning, error, info).
